name: Fizz
headline: Fizz is the #1 money app for students.
description:
Fizz is the #1 money app for students. Whether you want to build credit, manage your money or have no idea where to start, Fizz is there to help you every step of the way.

Download the app for free to check your credit score, get personalized spending insights and take fun bite-sized courses. Become a Fizz Member to take your finances to the next level with a debit card that builds credit. With no interest and daily autopay that prevents you from overspending, the Fizz Card is the ultimate financial hack. Students at over 300 universities including Michigan State, University of Florida, UCLA and Harvard chose Fizz for safe credit building with daily autopay, smart spend limits, and local campus deals. Fizz is backed by Kleiner Perkins, SV Angel, Y Combinator, and the founders of eight Unicorns.

founders.name: Carlo Kobe, Founder
founders.description: Originally from Germany. Then studied Statistics at Harvard. Now building Fizz. Carlo@joinfizz.com

students
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qUrNtMRi10QPLxf7qzYXOVMg218.svg)


As seen in

## The money app everyone is talking about
  * ### Fizz is like having a financial sidekick as a student
No interest rates, no credit checks, just easy credit building. It pays off all my purchases every day so I’m literally never worrying about going into debt.
[Read on the App Store](https://www.joinfizz.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/fizz-the-student-card/id1629069157>)
  *   * ### Student Approved
School takes up my time but the short, informative articles helps with my financial planning. I definitely recommend if you're looking to become financially independent.
[Read on the App Store](https://www.joinfizz.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/fizz-the-student-card/id1629069157>)
  *   * ### Great for helping me budget.
Fizz gives me a spending limit which forces me to be better at budgeting. It’s working!! Great App! I’ve recommended it to my friends as a gateway to budgeting! 
[Review from AppStore](https://www.joinfizz.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/fizz-the-student-card/id1629069157>)
  *   * ### Helped me secure my first apartment
From improving my credit score and knowledge on getting approved, I never would have been able to get a lease signed. Thanks Fizz
[Read on the App Store](https://www.joinfizz.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/fizz-the-student-card/id1629069157>)
  *   * ### Easy for college students!
I just started using Fizz to build credit. It's so helpful learning to manage my money. Their reward system is great, lots of opportunities to save & make money
[Read on the App Store](https://www.joinfizz.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/fizz-the-student-card/id1629069157>)

## Manage and master your money
## Manage and masteryour money
## Manage and master your money

Track your spending
Track your spending
Find out where your money’s going, get a custom budget based on your spending history, and set limits by category.
Find out where your money’s going, get a custom budget based on your spending history, and set limits by category.
Monitor your credit
Monitor your credit
Check your credit score, get alerted when it changes, and build credit history step-by-step.
Check your credit score, get alerted when it changes, and build credit history step-by-step.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/weelNuR5JDdI6bMVb8VMv7E33E.png?scale-down-to=1024)

Learn about personal finance
Learn about personal finance
Become a money whiz with games and quizzes on investing, credit, budgeting and more. 
Become a money whiz with games and quizzes on investing, credit, budgeting and more. 
## Build Credit With Fizz
## Build Credit with Fizz
Powered by Mastercard
More than just a card
Build credit with confidence 
Earn cash back
Daily autopay and smart spend limits
No hidden fees or interest
Cash back and rewards
3% cash back in the spending category of your choice
Surprise rewards on the first Friday of every month
Flash deals for up to 100% off at your favorite spots
Earn over $300 in annual cash back and rewards value from your Fizz card and leave more money in your pocket – where it belongs.¹
How Fizz works
01
Become a Fizz Member, connect your existing bank account, and apply for a line of credit offered by our bank partner–no credit checks or co-signors needed!
02
Use your Fizz Card for everyday purchases, which get covered by your separate line of credit.
03
Take advantage of optional features like Daily Autopay and Fizz’s smart “Available to Spend” guidance to stay on top of your finances.
04
Fizz reports your repayment track record to the credit bureaus, so you can build credit while earning rewards!

## Connects with over 15,000 banks
## Connects with over15,000 banks
Connect your bank of choice to track your spending and manage your subscriptions. With the Fizz Card, you can put your credit building on auto-pilot with Fizz’s Daily Autopay feature.
Security and support
you can trust
Security and support you can trust
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ppoxjedbVhaP5JgmDNkJnkYOs.png)
Best in class encryption
We follow best in class frameworks like PCI-DSS and SOC2. Plus, you are secured with Mastercard’s Zero Liability Protection.
Top-tier customer support
If you need help or have any question, our customer support folks are standing by 7-days a week for real human help. 
App controls
Block your card anytime from the app. Activate smart alerts to stay on top of your money and use FaceID to log in.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/fNFg4Ikn8h7g90AMP4jOX6Iwy8.png)
## Start your financial journey today
[Get Started](https://www.joinfizz.com/<https:/web.joinfizz.com >)

ShoulderTap Technologies, Inc. d/b/a Fizz © 2024. 
450 Broadway, Level 2, New York, NY 10013. All rights reserved. FIZZ® is registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office.
ShoulderTap Technologies, Inc. d/b/a Fizz (“Fizz”) is not a bank. The Fizz Debit Mastercard® (“Fizz Card”) is issued by Patriot Bank, N.A., Member FDIC, pursuant to a license from Mastercard® and may be used everywhere Mastercard® debit cards are accepted. Any loans you may be offered in connection with your use of the Fizz Card are originated by Lead Bank, a Missouri state-chartered bank. Any promotions or rewards you may be offered in connection with your use of the Fizz Card are offered and managed by Fizz, not our bank partners.
All activities conducted by Fizz as program manager in connection with the Fizz Card and the corresponding line of credit are conducted by Fizz Technologies, Inc. (NMLS: 2522542).
Membership is subject to a periodic, recurring subscription fee. Fizz Members may choose to apply for a Fizz Card, but are not required to. Fizz Membership does not guarantee access to a Fizz Card. Application and eligibility restrictions apply. ¹Over $300 in annual value of Fizz Card based on cash value available to Fizz Card users assuming half of all available rewards and promotions are used. Actual results may vary. To opt out of future recurring subscription charges, Members may cancel their Membership through the app at any time prior to their next billing date. Cardholders who cancel their Membership will lose access to their Fizz Card and line of credit at the end of their subscription term. Closing a line of credit may negatively [impact your credit score.](https://www.joinfizz.com/<https:/help.joinfizz.com/en/articles/10421421-closing-your-fizz-card>)
Fizz cardholders: Fizz reports your payment history on the revolving, open-end line of credit accessed by your Fizz Card. Increases or specific changes to your credit score are not guaranteed. Impact on your credit score may vary depending on your use. Fizz is required to report late payments, missed payments, or other defaults on your account, which may negatively impact your credit score. Credit scores are independently determined by credit bureaus based on a number of factors, including your activity with other creditors. The Fizz Card and related services will not remove negative credit history from your credit report. Fizz, on behalf of Lead Bank, will report your activities to Experian® and Transunion® . 
For additional information, terms and conditions applicable to your use of Fizz’s services, please consult Fizz’s Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, the Cardholder Agreement, any Line of Credit Agreement in effect between you and Lead Bank and any and all other applicable terms, policies and guidelines made available to you through the Fizz services.
Selected customers reviews above describe individual experiences or results. Individuals in TikTok videos featured above are paid spokespeople. Selected customer reviews above describe individual experiences or results. Actual results may vary. App Store rating as of January 2025.
²Credit score sliding scale feature is for informational purposes only. Credit score ranges based on information available on RentSpree. Car loan figures assume a loan value of $30,000 over 72 months and based on information available on CNN. Student loan figures assumes a $35,000 private student loan with a 10-year term and based on information available on CNBC, NerdWallet and Credible. Apartment approval based on information available on BI and RentSpree.
Fizz is not a credit repair tool and does not offer any form of credit counselling services. Fizz makes no representation or promise that it will improve your credit score, history, or profile or provide you with any assistance in that regard. None of Fizz’s services, including your ability to check your credit report and/or score through the Fizz App, is offered or provided with respect to the extension of credit by third parties. Fizz and its affiliates are not credit repair organizations or credit services organizations, and are not offering to sell, provide or perform any service to you for the express or implied purpose of either improving your credit record, credit history or credit rating, obtaining an extension of credit for you, or providing advice or assistance to you with regard to improving your credit record, credit history or credit rating.
For people with disabilities, including those who are visually impaired, deaf, or hard of hearing, we accept messages via our in-app chat, emails at support@joinfizz.com, and calls on our answering machine at [(940) 260-2704](https://www.joinfizz.com/<tel:9402602704>). If you leave us a voicemail, please leave your name and number and a member of our customer support team will return your call.

Actual results may vary. To opt out of future recurring subscription charges, Members may cancel their Membership through the app at any time prior to their next billing date. Cardholders who cancel their Membership will lose access to their Fizz Card and line of credit at the end of their subscription term. Closing a line of credit may negatively [impact your credit score.](https://www.joinfizz.com/<https:/help.joinfizz.com/en/articles/10421421-closing-your-fizz-card>)
Fizz cardholders: Fizz reports your payment history on the revolving, open-end line of credit accessed by your Fizz Card. Increases or specific changes to your credit score are not guaranteed. Impact on your credit score may vary depending on your use. Fizz is required to report late payments, missed payments, or other defaults on your account, which may negatively impact your credit score. Credit scores are independently determined by credit bureaus based on a number of factors, including your activity with other creditors. The Fizz Card and related services will not remove negative credit history from your credit report. Fizz, on behalf of Lead Bank, will report your activities to Experian® and Transunion® . 
For additional information, terms and conditions applicable to your use of Fizz’s services, please consult Fizz’s Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, the Cardholder Agreement, any Line of Credit Agreement in effect between you and Lead Bank and any and all other applicable terms, policies and guidelines made available to you through the Fizz services.

Apartment approval based on information available on BI and RentSpree.

## Build Credit With Fizz
## Build Credit with Fizz
Powered by Mastercard
More than just a card
Build credit with confidence 
Earn cash back
Daily autopay and smart spend limits
No hidden fees or interest
Cash back and rewards
3% cash back in the spending category of your choice
Surprise rewards on the first Friday of every month
Flash deals for up to 100% off at your favorite spots
Earn over $300 in annual cash back and rewards value from your Fizz card and leave more money in your pocket – where it belongs.¹
How Fizz works
01
Become a Fizz Member, connect your existing bank account, and apply for a line of credit offered by our bank partner–no credit checks or co-signors needed!
02
Use your Fizz Card for everyday purchases, which get covered by your separate line of credit.
03
Take advantage of optional features like Daily Autopay and Fizz’s smart “Available to Spend” guidance to stay on top of your finances.
04
Fizz reports your repayment track record to the credit bureaus, so you can build credit while earning rewards!

## Connects with over 15,000 banks
## Connects with over15,000 banks
Connect your bank of choice to track your spending and manage your subscriptions. With the Fizz Card, you can put your credit building on auto-pilot with Fizz’s Daily Autopay feature.
Security and support
you can trust
Security and support you can trust
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ppoxjedbVhaP5JgmDNkJnkYOs.png)
Best in class encryption
We follow best in class frameworks like PCI-DSS and SOC2. Plus, you are secured with Mastercard’s Zero Liability Protection.
Top-tier customer support
If you need help or have any question, our customer support folks are standing by 7-days a week for real human help. 
App controls
Block your card anytime from the app. Activate smart alerts to stay on top of your money and use FaceID to log in.

Car loan figures assume a loan value of $30,000 over 72 months and based on information available on CNN. Student loan figures assumes a $35,000 private student loan with a 10-year term and based on information available on CNBC, NerdWallet and Credible. Apartment approval based on information available on BI and RentSpree.
Fizz is not a credit repair tool and does not offer any form of credit counselling services. Fizz makes no representation or promise that it will improve your credit score, history, or profile or provide you with any assistance in that regard. None of Fizz’s services, including your ability to check your credit report and/or score through the Fizz App, is offered or provided with respect to the extension of credit by third parties. Fizz and its affiliates are not credit repair organizations or credit services organizations, and are not offering to sell, provide or perform any service to you for the express or implied purpose of either improving your credit record, credit history or credit rating, obtaining an extension of credit for you, or providing advice or assistance to you with regard to improving your credit record, credit history or credit rating.
For people with disabilities, including those who are visually impaired, deaf, or hard of hearing, we accept messages via our in-app chat, emails at support@joinfizz.com, and calls on our answering machine at (940) 260-2704⟨12⟩. If you leave us a voicemail, please leave your name and number and a member of our customer support team will return your call.

generated_description:
### Fizz: The #1 Money App for Students

**Overview**  
Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Fizz is a financial technology company focused on helping students take control of their finances. Their central mission is clear: to be the foremost money app for students, offering tools to build credit, manage money, and provide personalized insights.

**What Does Fizz Offer?**  
The Fizz app provides a range of features tailored specifically for students:

- **Free Credit Checks**: Users can check their credit score at no cost.
- **Personalized Spending Insights**: The app analyzes spending habits and offers customized financial advice.
- **Bite-Sized Courses**: Fun, short courses aim to improve financial literacy.
- **Fizz Card**: A debit card that helps students build credit without interest. Daily autopay systems ensure users don’t overspend by automatically paying off purchases.
- **Campus Deals**: Fizz partners with businesses to provide special offers at over 300 universities, including prestigious institutions such as Harvard and UCLA.

**User Demographics**  
With a user base exceeding 100,000 students across various universities, Fizz has quickly become a trusted tool for credit building and budgeting among young people. Reviews highlight its simplicity and effectiveness, making it feel like a financial sidekick for students.

**Funding and Leadership**  
Fizz is backed by notable investors including Kleiner Perkins, SV Angel, Y Combinator, and founders of eight unicorn companies. Leading the charge is Dalton Caldwell, Group Partner at Y Combinator, who brings substantial expertise in the startup ecosystem.

**Team and Location**  
Operated by a small team of 15 employees, Fizz is headquartered in New York City.

**Why Choose Fizz?**  
In a world where students often face daunting financial decisions, Fizz’s straightforward, supportive platform empowers them to make informed choices. The absence of hidden fees and the intuitive design make it an ideal first step into personal finance. 

**How to Get Started**  
Ready to empower your financial journey? Download the [Fizz App](https://www.joinfizz.com/) for free on iOS and Android, and begin taking control of your financial future today.

In summary, Fizz is designed for students who want an easy, risk-free way to begin managing their finances and building credit. Whether you're just starting out or looking to refine your budgeting skills, Fizz has something to offer.
